repairedDockerfile:
FROM docker:latest 
RUN \
 apk --update --no-cache add \  
bash \  
curl \  
less \  
groff \  
jq \  
git \  
zip \  
python \  
py-pip && \
 pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade \
awscli \
awsebcli \
docker-compose && \
pip uninstall docker-py; pip uninstall docker; pip install --no-cache-dir docker && \
mkdir /root/.aws
